    • Method Detail

      • bindItem

        public void bindItem(T item)
        Stores the data item associated with the ViewHolder. Subclasses should override this method and call super method first, then provide implementation of how the model's data should be displayed in this ViewHolder.
        Parameters:
        item - data item for this ViewHolder
